articles.author: Anna Marie Abram
articles.title: 'Two BOA dials and an impeccable fit: I love these gravel shoes' - Anna Marie Abram's Gear of the Year 2023 - CyclingWeekly
articles.description: Through much trial and error (and several new releases), I’m finally finding the gravel kit that’s up to my expectations
articles.content:
After racing on the road for over a decade, I’m pretty set in my way and know what I like when it comes to training on the tarmac.
But more recently, since getting into gravel, I’m constantly discov… [+3911 chars]
